1.0.1.name: wordpress/wp-nofollow-post
1.0.1.description: Add nofollow attribute to all external links on posts / pages. Exception can be added on several domains. This plugin will not remove old rel of a link (if any), but this plugin smartly adds necessary rel attributes. For addition this plugin can remove links on comments too.
